dreams.question: When you were a child, what did you always dream of doing when you got older? What do they symbolise?
What are some childhood dreams or interests you were never able to fully explore but still find intriguing?
What difference do you want to make in the world? What legacy would you like to leave behind?
You inherit R100 million, how would it change your life? What would you do with your days?
When you are dead and gone, what would you like people to say about the way you lived your life?
What careers do you have wild dreams of having?
If someone were to pay all of your living costs and expenses for 2 years, what work would you pursue in that time?
If you were to change 3 things in the world for the greater good, what would they be?
What is it that you would regret not doing with your life, if you were to die tomorrow?
What piece of knowledge do you feel as though you would love to share with the world?
The person that loves you most in the whole world asks you what you need to be doing with your life in order to be really happy. How do you respond?
If you had 5 years left to live, what would you do?
How have your fears and limiting beliefs held you back from finding or pursuing your passion in the past?
Are there any people in your life preventing you from pursuing your passion? Who are they and how are they holding you back?
What is something (or several things) you’d really like to achieve before you die?

passions.question: What are your 3 favourite topics to discuss? What could you talk about for hours on end?
What things in life really make you feel free?
Let 5 people who love and know you best tell you that you would be amazing at doing for a living.
What naturally flows for you without you even having to try?
If you were to wake up tomorrow feeling truly free and happily excited about your day ahead, what  would you be off to do?
You are totally ‘in your element’ and time seems to have disappeared. What are you doing?
It is your birthday and somebody buys you an annual magazine subscription. Which type would you love it to be?
What areas of life are you naturally drawn to?
What do people ask you for information/advice about? Which areas are you deemed to be a little fountain of knowledge?
If you were to pioneer a cause around the world, and it was guaranteed to be a success, what would it be?
What do you love to do when you have free time and what is it that gives you that real buzz of excitement?
What topics interest you and what would you really love to know lots more about?
You love helping people with these 3 different things. What are they?
What interests or hobbies have you had in the past few years that intrigue you and might hold the potential for a life passion?
What would be hard for you to give up?

people_id.question: 5 people that inspire you most in the world stand before you. Who are they and what is it about them that sparks something within you?
Who is someone in your life or in history whose life and work inspires and excites you? Why?
Who influenced your life most and why?
With which character in a book or movie did you relate well and why?
Which super hero was you favourite when you were small? What can that say about you?

options.tooltip: You like to interact with babies between the newborn stage and the age of 2.
You like to interact with children between the ages of 2 and 5.
You like to interact with children between the ages of 6 and 13.
You like to interact with children between the ages of 13 and 19.
You like to interact young adults that are between the ages of 19 and 24.
You like to interact with children between the ages of 13 and 19.
You like to interact with people who have some or other need.
You like to interact with people who are currently in a career.
You like to interact with people who are currently married.
You like to interact with senior citizens.
You like to interact with people who are physically and/or mentally handicapped.
You like to interact with people who are addicted to a substance.
You like to interact with people who have no refuge.
You like to interact with males.
You like to interact with females.
You do not like to interact with people in general.
You are good at resolving anything complex and like to pull it apart to make it simple. Concentrate on the detail.
You are good at expressing yourself in one of the art forms, fine arts, literature, music, performing arts, etc
Someone who has an easy explanation for things. Wants everyone to understand.
Someone who loves to collect things, information, memories, etc.
Someone who is positively stimulated by competition. Thrives on challenges.
You like to invent systems to establish order out of chaos or disorder.

You are a person with great assertiveness, you are willing to make decisions and bear the consequences.
If you make a decision you easily stick to it.
You have a special skill to handle a situation in such a way that no one is offended, you are tactful.
You find it easy to support your friends in any difficult situation adding positive energy to complete the task.
You see the business potential in any situation.
You create a situation or environment where things can happen, you make progress easier. Launch pad.
You are an enthusiast. Backer, ally, loyal
You are extremely loyal, trustworthy and committed.
You are fond of sharing your resources (money, time, etc)
You like to see that things and people are working or blending together. You are a mediator who brings one thing into harmonious agreement with another.
You have an inner drive to challenge people. You easily affect other people by what you say.
You like to think about new ideas, you are innovative.
You always want to know the truth behind every situation.
People find it easy to follow your lead.
You find it easy to be focused on what people say when they talk to you. Soundboard.
You know how to persuade people to believe in anything that you’re selling: products, ideas etc.
You like coaching people in one on one relationships. You are considered a wise and trusted counsellor or teacher.
You like to bargain, like to find a common ground. You are good at arranging or settling a matter by discussion and mutual agreement.
You are good at bringing together all the components.
You like to see that conflict situations are resolved.
You are not afraid to start something new. You plant the seed.
You tend fight for the underdog. You are considered a guardian, place of safety or a defender.
You always think about the practical workability of a task. Ask daring but necessary questions.
You will always challenge a group to excellence.
Lifelong self learner, you enjoy to learn new things, read up.
You have the ability to explain something.
You bring a team together to accomplish a goal and motivate them.
You like to start something new (like a pioneer) but people tend to follow you.
You like get do the things done. You like working hard to achieve your goals.
...managing a (big) task, usually involves paperwork and sorting things out.
...examining methodically by separating into parts and studying their interrelations.
...showing imagination and skill in the arts. You are sensitive to arts or appreciate art.
...carrying the message across effectively. Explaining anything with ease.
You find it easy to learn how to use new computer programs and are not afraid of trying out new technology.
...taking control of any situation. In other words, you easily manage any situation.
...giving and taking advice. You like to offer advice or guidance.
...being imaginative. You have the ability or power to create.  You are characterized by originality and expressiveness.
...making decisions easily and stick to it.
...identifying with and understanding another person's situation, feelings and motives.
...To hold the attention of with something amusing or diverting.
...doing things with your hands, building things, creating, being creative.
...portraying ideas in such a matter to others so that they are persuaded to �buy what you are selling�. You are good at convincing people
...conferring with others in order to come to terms or reach an agreement.
...expressing yourself effectively in quantitative terms. You also like working with numbers, and maths.
...seeing a situation from an external the point of view even if you are not an outsider, you wont let your emotions or beliefs influence your perception of a situation.
...putting things together into an orderly, functional, structured whole.
...formulating a scheme or program for the accomplishment a goal.  You like to have something as a specific aim or purpose.
You have the ability to use a musical instrument to its full potential, have the talent of making music.
...doing things in a practical, executable manner. You like finding the easiest, cheapest and most effective way of doing things.
...speaking in front of people, you like entertaining, motivating, teaching and inspiring any group of people.
...collecting information by reading, you like to read about things that interest you. You love to spend time in the library or on the Internet doing research or reading up on something.
understanding other people's needs. You are sensitive to their emotions and they feel welcome in your company.
You like to make your resources available to other people to use to their advantage.
...mostly physical activities you take on. You probably have a good ball sense and love to be active.
...preparing for something specific focusing on the bigger picture taking into account the small things that needs to be done to achieve the bigger picture.
You like to learn about something and usually remember it very well.
...taking hold of a situation and people find it natural to follow your lead.
To provide knowledge; instruct in.
...expressing yourself in writing. You'd rather write than speak.

spoken_words.question: Fill these commonly spoken words below.
Now summarise the central themes from your answer and type them below.

values.question: What are your top  most deeply held core values?
How does your life currently support or reflect those values?
Which of your top values are you ignoring or not giving enough attention?
What values will you never compromise?
Which jobs would encompass your core values?
